definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Wrap the middle of the band around your foot.
sentences.chinese: 將治療帶的中部纏繞於足部。

sentences.english: The central area is characterized by many lakes, bogs and low ridges.
sentences.chinese: 中部的平原地帶以衆多的湖泊，沼澤和低嶺爲特點。

sentences.english: In the central regions you'll encounter rugged land and rolling hills.
sentences.chinese: 在中部地區，你會遇到崎嶇的土地和連綿起伏的丘陵。

sentences.english: This site is located slightly north from the centre of the Hetao plain on the northern edge of the Xixia (Tangut) domain.
sentences.chinese: 該遺址位於河套平原中部偏北，地處西夏國的北部。

sentences.english: Then between the east and the west, we have what we call the City,
sentences.chinese: 然後在東西部之間是中部，我們稱之爲城市。

sentences.english: He traveled by train across central Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他乘火車穿越歐洲中部旅行。

sentences.english: Hubei province, located in the middle of the borderland referred to in dongting lake and hubei.
sentences.chinese: 湖北簡稱，地處我國中部，以居洞庭湖北而得名。

sentences.english: In 2009, a team of British cavers investigated a recently uncovered cave in a remote Vietnamese jungle.
sentences.chinese: 年，一羣英國洞窟專家到越南中部森林深處探險。

sentences.english: A young blonde was on vacation in the depths of Louisiana.
sentences.chinese: 一位年輕的金髮女郎在路易斯安那州中部度假。

sentences.english: Almost the entire burden was thrown onto the crowded sections of middle and southern England.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎全部重荷都放在英國南部和中部的擁擠區域。

sentences.english: Mayan Indian group of central Chiapas in southern Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 南墨西哥恰帕斯中部的馬雅印第安人。

sentences.english: From the very early days of cocoa the peoples of Central America used beans as a form of payment.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，美洲中部的先民就用可可豆作爲支付方式。

sentences.english: But central and western areas of China have the speediest growth rates.
sentences.chinese: 然而，中國中部和西部富豪的增長速度最快。

sentences.english: Kabale is quite a landmark in central Africa.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲中部，卡巴爾還是個挺突出的地方。

sentences.english: The vigilante group had vowed yesterday to extend the operation all over Central Kenya
sentences.chinese: 民團昨天曾誓言要把他們的行動擴大到肯尼亞中部。

sentences.english: Health in the central part of the island to a famous temple monkeys, and monkeys in droves.
sentences.chinese: 在島中部的生宜有著名的猴子廟，猴子成羣結隊。

definition: Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
